document_data.caption: A map showing the Fieldway and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Fieldway
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fieldway''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Fieldway was located in the western and central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. It ran east to west in between the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and the [[Trollyard]], spanning more than half of the Field Ward. The Fieldway was intersected by [[Nanze Street]], [[Boltspring Alley]], [[Burnt Inn Street]], [[Firewine Alley]], [[Soot Alley]], [[Saltpork Street]], and [[Prestige Lane]].
